description: A set of small monitors.  Required to view cameras' output.
A security camera you could connect to a display.  Image quality is quite low, but the field of vision is great.
A security camera with a cage built around it to protect it from damage without reducing its effectiveness.
A set of various vehicle controls.  Useful for crafting.
A set of leather bindings to control a mountable creature.
A vehicle instrument panel with various gauges and switches.  Useful for crafting.
A vehicle instrument panel with various gauges and switches.  Useful for crafting.

name.str_pl: sets of drive by wire controls

description: A fully electronic vehicle control system.  You could control it remotely if you had the proper tools.
A set of servos, microcontrollers, and other devices, together capable of driving an unmanned vehicle.  Its AI is not functional, but it should still have some sort of maintenance mode.
A set of motors, cameras, and various electronic modules banded together to allow for tracking targets, friend-or-foe identification, and firing the connected turret in full automatic mode.
